body: There is a problem. This class can have its own `DummyName` or it can get it from Python interface. When it's from Python interface we don't claim ownership. Therefore I use `shared_ptr` with customized dtor to handle both cases.
body_html: There is a problem. This class can have its own DummyName or it can get it from Python interface. When it's from Python interface we don't claim ownership. Therefore I use shared_ptr with customized dtor to handle both cases.
